scripts.mysqldump:full: docker exec -t mysql mysqldump -u root --databases query-cache-test > ./sql/full.sql
scripts.mysqldump:schema: docker exec -t mysql mysqldump -u root --databases query-cache-test --no-data | sed -e 's/ AUTO_INCREMENT=[0-9]*//' > ./sql/1_schema.sql
scripts.mysqldump:data: docker exec -t mysql mysqldump -u root -t --databases query-cache-test --no-create-db > ./sql/2_data.sql
